Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Antigonos had awarded the usufruct of the villages and kleroi to Mnesimachos.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Mnesimachos took out a loan of 1,325 chrusoi from the temple of Artemis.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
The sanctuary of Artemis claimed the usufruct of Mnesimachos' estate when he failed to repay the loan he had taken with it as security.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Outline of the tributary dues of the villages and kleroi of Mnesimachos, which are expressed in chrusoi and gold obols, totalling 116 chrusoi and 7 gold obols.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Outline of the tributary dues of the villages and kleroi of Mnesimachos, which are expressed in chrusoi and gold obols, totalling 116 chrusoi and 7 gold obols.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Outline of the tributary dues of two kleroi of Mnesimachos expressed in artabas of seed, totalling 21 artabas, of which a proportion was paid in kind each year.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Penalty of 2,650 chrusoi and the monetary value in gold of the produce of Mnesimachos' estates, should he fail to prevent an external claimant from attempting to obtain possession of the estates.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Penalty of 2,650 chrusoi and the monetary value in gold of the produce of Mnesimachos' estates, should he fail to prevent an external claimant from attempting to obtain possession of the estates.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Penalty of 1,325 chrusoi and the monetary value in gold of the produce of Mnesimachos' estates, should king Antigonos seek to reclaim the land and revoke Mnesimachos' usufruct.
Record of the mortgage of the property of Mnesimachos to the temple of Artemis at Sardeis
Penalty of 1,325 chrusoi and the monetary value in gold of the produce of Mnesimachos' estates, should king Antigonos seek to reclaim the land and revoke Mnesimachos' usufruct.

Earlier agreement with a certain Meleagros to receive back the village Sibloe after making payment, perhaps as a result of borrowing money on the security of the Sibloe; the price is indicated as 448 drachmas and 1.5 obols.
Letter of Eumenes II to the settlers of Apollonioucharax (A), with a petition of the same community (B)

Earlier agreement with a certain Meleagros to receive back the village Sibloe after making payment, perhaps as a result of borrowing money on the security of the Sibloe; the price is indicated as 448 drachmas and 1.5 obols.
